UniProt Entry.description: The amino acid sequence of the current peptide coincides with the amino acid sequence of the UniProt entry.

Literature.Title: Lasiocepsin, a novel cyclic antimicrobial peptide from the venom of eusocial bee Lasioglossum laticeps (Hymenoptera: Halictidae).
Literature.Author: Monincová L, Slaninová J, Fucík V, Hovorka O, Voburka Z, Bednárová L, Malon P, Stokrová J, Cerovský V

Sequence Information.Target Organism: Bacillus subtilis(MIC=35µM),Staphylococcus aureus(MIC=>100µM),Escherichia coli B(MIC=>100µM),Pseudomonas aeruginosa(MIC=>100µM),Candida albicans F7-39/IDE99(MIC=>100µM)
